content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I browsed the National Geographic website for more information on Japan's plan to release nuclear wastewater into the Pacific. The website provided details that Japan plans to release over a million tons of treated nuclear wastewater from the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant into the Pacific Ocean, causing controversy among neighboring countries and scientists. The wastewater contains radioactive isotopes, and experts are concerned about its potential environmental threat and impact on ecosystems. Some countries and American scientists are urging Japan to delay the releases, citing a lack of adequate and accurate scientific data supporting Japan's assertion of safety. The International Atomic Energy Agency is reviewing the intended wastewater releases against international safety standards and is expected to release a report in late June.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "potential environmental impact of treated nuclear wastewater in the pacific ocean"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.nationalgeographic.com/premium/article/fukushima-japan-nuclear-wastewater-pacific-ocean", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2666683921000183", "https://www.npr.org/2021/04/13/986695494/japan-to-dump-wastewater-from-wrecked-fukushima-nuclear-plant-into-pacific-ocean", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S095965262104186X", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9659344/", "https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35170214/", "https://www.jhunewsletter.com/article/2021/04/fukushima-dumping-radioactive-wastewater-in-the-pacific-is-an-easy-but-wrong-solution", "https://www.epa.gov/ocean-dumping/learn-about-ocean-dumping"]', type='action_result')]
"""
